title: 04/22/21 DPS Hour 1 Ben Volin
itunes:title: 04/22/21 DPS Hour 1 Ben Volin
description:
Ahmed Fareed is in for Dan Patrick today. Ben Volin talks to Ahmed about the rule changes in the NFL, or non-changes. Ben says that the NFL did not want to change a lot due to the COVID-19.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
